price: Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee (ne adesua ne afutusεm) wͻ Yosef ne ne nuanom (abakᴐsεm) no mu dema wͻn a wͻbisa (ho asεm no).
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
